## ExMap.setBasemapStyle() method

设置底图样式

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setBasemapStyle(style: mapboxgl.Style | string, restoreGroupLayers?: boolean, styleOptions?: {
        diff?: boolean;
        localIdeographFontFamily?: string;
    }): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  style | mapboxgl.Style \| string | 样式 |
|  restoreGroupLayers | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> 恢复图层组 |
|  styleOptions | { diff?: boolean; localIdeographFontFamily?: string; } | <i>(Optional)</i> 样式配置 |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
